original_query: SELECT MIN(pl.Id) FROM postLinks as pl, posts as p, users as u, badges as b WHERE p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND pl.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-17 01:23:50' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score>=-1 AND p.Score<=10 AND p.AnswerCount<=5 AND p.CommentCount=2 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount<=6 AND u.Views<=33 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-19 17:31:36' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-06 07:23:12' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-10 22:50:06' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-17 01:23:50'

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) >= -1 AND CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) <= 10 AND posts.AnswerCount <= 5 AND posts.CommentCount = 2 AND (CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) <= 6)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 22:50:06'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E4.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views <= 33 AND users.DownVotes >= 0 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-19 17:31:36' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-06 07:23:12')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E4.OwnerUserId=E3.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E4E3 WHERE E1.RelatedPostId=E2E4E3.Id)
